text: hananim-eun haneulgwa ttang-ui bich-i la geu bich-eul biyuhasa byeog-wiui deungjangwa gat-eun geos-eulo geu an-e deungbul i iss-eumyeo geu deungbul-eun yulian-e issdeola geu yulineun chugbogbad-eun olli beu gileum-eulo byeolcheoleom balg-ge bichnado da geugeos-eun dongjjog-e issneun namudo a niyo seojjog-e issneun namudo anila geu gileum-eun bul-i dahjido anihana deoug bichna bich-wie bich-eul teohadoda hananim-eun geubun-i wonhaneunjaleul geu bich-eulo indohasimyeo salamdeul wie yejeung-eul boisini hananim-eun modeun geos-eul asim-eulo chungmanhasinola
